attacks.name: Telekinesis
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. This damage isn’t affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Reigning Pulse
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Psychic Nova GX
attacks.effect: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks during your opponent’s next turn. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
